story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_01: Did you find anything that interests you, Giratina?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_02: You sure seem interested in something.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_03:
I wonder if that’s how people see me when I’m
working, too.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_04:
There you are, Cynthia! I thought you might
be here!
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_05: Are you checking out the ruins again today?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_06: I sure am. Giratina seemed interested in them, too.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_07:
But...the ruins on Pasio are just replicas of ruins
from other regions, aren’t they?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_08:
They are. But Legendary Pokémon seem to have
been appearing here.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_09:
As an archaeologist, I’m always curious about
the authenticity of ruins—and what kind of history
they have.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_10:
But I think Giratina’s more interested in the traces
of other Pokémon that came here.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_11:
I see... Maybe it kept seeing you surveying these
ruins and wanted to copy you!
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_13:
Either way, I can sense that Giratina’s own heart
has led it here to see these ruins for reasons
that are different from mine.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_14:
Oh. What’s wrong, Giratina? Did you
find something?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_16: Cyrus had Palkia with him before...
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_17:
Perhaps he’s also brought Dialga here to
Pasio, too?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_18: I don’t see anyone else here, though.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_20: I wonder if it was trying to tell us something...
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_21:
It didn’t seem aggressive, so I don’t think it was
Cyrus’s Pokémon.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_22: Well, we’re still not sure about that.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_23:
Actually, we’ve heard that Team Galactic is
resuming its operations on Pasio!
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_24:
What if that just now was a warning from
Team Galactic?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_26: Will you help us stop them?
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_27: Of course. You have my help.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_29:
Cyrus... If you’re up to your old tricks again, I’ll
have no choice but to stop you.
story_teamgalactic_01_04000/2401_1201_30:
Is there no hope of you changing in this world
we share?
